hints.content:
$\goldE{?}+ 445 = 864$

![A number line with 2 points labeled. An arrow from point 445 to point 864 is labeled, plus question mark.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/782da27ad8795182b7f5ea316a9a02c3f53f469f)

Let's start by adding hundreds to ${445}$ until we get as close to  ${864}$ as possible without going over ${864}$.

$\begin{align}
{445} +\purpleD{100}=545\\\\
{545} +\purpleD{100}= 645\\\\
{645} +\purpleD{100}= 745\\\\
{745} +\purpleD{100}= 845
\end{align}$

If we add $\purpleD{4 \text{ hundreds}}$, or $\purpleD{4 00}$, we reach $845$. We cannot add any more hundreds without going over ${864}$.

![The same number line, with an arrow from point 445 to a new point 845 labeled, "plus 400"](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/ea63701a8f3d42b93977d40a80005537a6d673b8)

Next, let's add tens to $845$ until we get as close to  ${864}$ as possible without going over ${864}$.

$\begin{align}
845 +\blueD{10}=855
\end{align}$

If we add $\blueD{1 \text{ ten}}$, or $\blueD{10}$, we reach $855$. We cannot add any more tens without going over ${864}$.

![The same number line, with an arrow from point 845 to a new point 855 labeled, "plus 10"](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/acc65e17b3390c5f833075372628b04bda1a83a0)

Finally, how many ones should we add to  $855$ to get to  ${864}?$

$\begin{align}
855+\greenD{5} &=860\\\\
860+\greenD{4} &=864
\end{align}$

We add $\greenD{9\text{ ones}}$.

![The same number line, with an arrow from point 855 to point 864 labeled, "plus 9"](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/aca28d33524479b8309475c27060df5d2881125d)

We added $\purpleD{4 \text{ hundreds}}$, $\blueD{1 \text{ ten}}$, and $\greenD{9\text{ ones}}$ to ${445}$ to get to ${864}$.

$\purpleD{4 00}+\blueD{1 0}+\greenD{9}=\goldE{419}$

![The number line with all of the arrows shown. The original arrow from point 445 to point 864 is labeled, "plus 419." The arrows spans the arrows labeled "plus 400," "plus 10," and "plus 9."](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/9dae6c86412cef81543a0b7b5e73f9459dd73f8b)

question.content:
**What number makes this equation true?** 

[[â˜ƒ numeric-input 1]] ${} + 445 =864$
